## Checklist

**Important**: New builtins belong in
[nvimtools/none-ls-extras.nvim](https://github.com/nvimtools/none-ls-extras.nvim)

- [ ] **Required**: If I'm adding a new builtin (linter, formatter, code action,
      etc.), I understand it should be contributed to
      [nvimtools/none-ls-extras.nvim](https://github.com/nvimtools/none-ls-extras.nvim)
      instead
- [ ] I've tested these changes locally
- [ ] I've updated any relevant documentation
